page.title: 06HOTEL OWNERS
page.content: Mr and Mrs Costa own a small ten bedroom hotel in the area. Ther serve full board and there are sandwiches and drinks available in the evening. The hotel caters fo sixteen people comfortably. For the most part the people who stay in the hotel are old age pensioners who prefer to have their meals at the place where they are staying, rather than go into a restaurant where prices are generally higher. There is a lounge where residents are free to relax and the dining room is at the front of the hotel. Meals are served at 8.30am, 1.00pm and 5.30pm. The ground floor bedroom has a private bathroom. The average price for a week at the hotel is Â£70 and for Bed and Breakfast it is Â£7. The Costas employ no outside labour.
